=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 9, col = 3)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 9, col = 3)

Given that the current position of the avatar has not changed from the last position, I need to assess the surroundings and take a meaningful action that can potentially alter the state of the game.

In the current state, the avatar is surrounded by:
- At (row = 9, col = 2) and (row = 9, col = 4), there is dirt (represented by '*').
- At (row = 9, col = 5) and (row = 9, col = 6), we can see some collectibles which include diamonds (represented by '&').
- There is also an enemy nearby at (row = 9, col = 15) represented by '#'.

Considering the game strategy, I should explore my options for action. The best course of action would be to **move right to (9, 4)** to collect the diamond there.

Thus, I will execute the following action: 

``` Action:3 ```
This action will help me collect valuable diamonds while also progressing towards goal objectives, as well as get me closer to maneuvering around the enemy.
